meanings.definition: Guanethidines: a class of drugs used to treat high blood pressure.
meanings.sent1: Doctors prescribed guanethidines to help lower my blood pressure.
meanings.sent2: The pharmacist explained how guanethidines work to control hypertension.
meanings.sent3: After taking guanethidines, I felt like my blood pressure was on vacation.
meanings.sent4: Guanethidines are like little warriors fighting against high blood pressure in your body.
meanings.sent5: The image of guanethidines battling high blood pressure is etched in my mind.
